brewery.brewery_description:
Kompania Piwowarska operates three breweries with a rich heritage: Tyskie Browary Książęce (established in 1629), the Dojlidy Brewery in Białystok (est. 1768) and Lech Browary Wielkopolski in Poznań (est. 1895). These breweries provide Polish people with their favourite beers, including Żubr, Tyskie, Lech, Dębowe, Redd’s and the Książęce specialty collection. 

Oficjalny profil Kompanii Piwowarskiej.

Kompania Piwowarska skupia trzy browary o wieloletniej historii: Tyskie Browary Książęce (rok założenia - 1629), Browar Dojlidy w Białymstoku (1768) i Lech Browary Wielkopolski w Poznaniu (1895). To w nich warzymy najchętniej wybierane przez Polaków piwa, między innymi: Żubra, Tyskie, Lecha, Dębowe, Redd’sa oraz kolekcję specjalności Książęcego. 

Wszystkie materiały są przeznaczone jedynie dla osób dorosłych powyżej 18 roku życia, w związku, z czym nie należy ich przekazywać ani udostępniać osobom poniżej 18 roku życia. Zachęcamy do podejmowania przemyślanych decyzji dotyczących alkoholi.

beer.beer_name: Lech Free Active Hydrate Liczi i Cytryna

venue.venue_name: Holiday Inn Express Warsaw - The HUB

beer.beer_name: Captain Jack - Jack On the Beach

beer.beer_description:
There he stands... majestic, firm, watchful and prudent. Żubr, the guardian of the wilderness, standing sentinel in the primeval forest where nature invariably takes its course. If need be, the Żubr leads the herd and protects it from danger, or takes shelter in the shade and lets things lie - especially when he feels he deserves some rest after a hard day’s work.

The Żubr will not cut corners when important matters are at stake. Aware of its pedigree, Żubr is brewed in accordance with the traditions of the Dojlidy Brewery. Once the full-flavoured beer has been brewed, the Żubr gazes calmly at the sky, and waits for it to be poured.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 135 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 28! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren’t you?. That’s 175 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 36!

beer.beer_description:
There he stands... majestic, firm, watchful and prudent. Żubr, the guardian of the wilderness, standing sentinel in the primeval forest where nature invariably takes its course. If need be, the Żubr leads the herd and protects it from danger, or takes shelter in the shade and lets things lie - especially when he feels he deserves some rest after a hard day’s work.

The Żubr will not cut corners when important matters are at stake. Aware of its pedigree, Żubr is brewed in accordance with the traditions of the Dojlidy Brewery. Once the full-flavoured beer has been brewed, the Żubr gazes calmly at the sky, and waits for it to be poured.

Dębowe is a full light lager - a bottom-fermentated beer. Its richer taste and higher extract content make it stand out among other lagers. Because of its sophisticated taste, it is best served at 10 degrees Celsius, a slightly higher temperature than for a regular lager. It derives its special character from carefully selected ingredients and a proper brewing process. 14.2°Blg

Tyskie Radler is the latest addition to the Tyskie family. It combines the smooth bitterness of Tyskie Gronie with the taste of fresh lemons, which makes it a light, naturally muddy and refreshing option for any get-togethers with friends.
Beer flavoured with rum

Prażubr to gatunek pradawny, niepasteryzowany. Powstał według receptury opracowanej w Browarze Dojlidy. Jest to hołd, jaki browarnicy składają przodkowi żubra białowieskiego, który królował na terenie Polski przed tysiącami lat.

Prażubr to klasyczny, jasny lager o umiarkowanym smaku chmielowej goryczki. Jest delikatnie nagazowany i klarowny.

Redd's Cranberry entered Kompania Piwowarska's portfolio in September 2011 as a limited edition, in March 2012 it became a permanent offer. Redd's Cranberry is a delicate, sweet but sophisticated, beery but with a a cranberry flavor. A refreshing beer, perfect choice also for autumn and winter nights.

Zobacz, jak zmienia się znaczenie słowa "piwo", gdy doda mu się kontekstu żurawinowego. Bo piwo może być wielosmaczne.

Wojak. Honestly Brewed. Wojak is the only economy beer in Kompania Piwowarska's portfolio, and the best choice for price sensitive consumers, looking for an honest offer: good beer at an affordable price. 

If you do something--do it honestly. Just as good beer is made. Just as Wojak is made. With no haste or artificial enzymes, brewed according to honest rules. This makes Wojak delectable and distinctive, simply truly beery. 

We do an honest job to ensure its quality. Try it and you'll appreciate it.
Wybierz się w podróż po nowych obszarach smaku, tam, gdzie nie zabrało Cię jeszcze żadne piwo. Przepustką w tej podróży jest Redd’s z jabłkiem i trawą cytrynową.

Redd's Apple entered Kompania Piwowarska's portfolio in the year 2000. Redd's Apple is the taste of a juicy apple coupled with lemon flavor. A very refreshing beer.

Redd's is a brand different than all the rest. It was created for women who seek remarkable taste combinations and new experiences. Redd's beer brands are fruit-flavored and refreshing. They are a perfect choice for women at parties and low-key get-togethers with friends. Since 2001 Redd's has been the leader in the category of flavoured beers.

Redd’s brings together! The delicate taste of raspberries and the explosive nature of pomegranate join forces to create beer like no other. Let yourself be surprised!

Redd's łączy! Delikatny smak malin wspólnie z wybuchowym charakterem granatu tworzą piwo, jakiego jeszcze nie było. Daj się zaskoczyć!

Piwo o smaku rumu i gorzkiej pomarańczy.

Beer flavored with rum & bitter orange.
Piwo (42%) z lemoniadą o smaku Margarity Truskawkowej (58%)

Redd’s Pear & Chilli – the latest recipe from Redd’s! Tasty Polish pear may seem just sweet but after spicing up with chilli pepper, it reveals its tangy character.

The lager base perfectly highlights the beery nature of the beverage.
Piwo z lemoniadą o smaku cytryny i yuzu (citrus junos), alk. 4,5 % obj., pasteryzowane.

beer.beer_name: Lech Free Active Hydrate Liczi i Cytryna

beer.beer_description: Piwo z napojem o smaku pomarańczy ananasa i grenadyny
